title: Sound On: CEO's Oppose GA Voting Law
itunes:title: Sound On: CEO's Oppose GA Voting Law
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis deliver insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Roger Fisk, Democratic Strategist and Principal of New Day Strategy, and Chris Hadfield, former commander of the International Space Station, and former Royal Canadian Air Force fighter pilot.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
